itemDisplayName: SQL Server AlwaysOn Cluster with Managed Disks in AZ
description: This template creates Azure VMs on an existing VNET, and provisions a SQL Server 2016 or 2017 AlwaysOn Availability Group cluster across AZ's
summary: This template creates Azure VMs for a SQL Server 2016 or 2017 AlwaysOn Availability Group cluster on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain.
